title: TS3 - Patch Update v1.2.7 (Invalid File Found Fix).zip
description: This pack is for those who are trying to update their version "1.0.631.00001" of the sims to version 1.2.7 and are receiving the error message "Update Error: Invalid File Found." I have tested this method myself and it works if you follow these directions very carefully. The crack and the patch are from other uploaders, they are not mine! I just wanted to get these files together with an explanation because it took me nearly 2 hours to figure all of this out via google. I left all of their original files intact so you can see credit within the enclosed read me text files and specific instructions for the patch and crack.
